mapper.update:
UPDATE u_user_extend
sex = #{sex},
nickname = #{nickname},
head_pic_url = #{headPicUrl},
name = #{name},
name_py = #{namePy},
regtime = #{regtime},
birthday = #{birthday},
mobile = #{mobile},
qq = #{qq},
member_code = #{memberCode},
remark = #{remark},
lastlogin = #{lastlogin},
activity_info = #{activityInfo},
is_complete = #{isComplete},
device_id = #{deviceId},
device_type = #{deviceType},
weixin = #{weixin},
workaddress_id = #{workaddressId},
status = #{status},
account_status = #{accountStatus},
invalid_time = #{invalidTime},
address = #{address},
is_administrator= #{isAdministrator},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
channel_source = #{channelSource},
id_card_no = #{idCardNo},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE u_user_extend
regtime = now(), status = 1, account_status = 0
WHERE id IN
#{id}
UPDATE u_user_extend SET is_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
update u_user_extend set invalid_time = #{po.invalidTime} where id = #{po.id}
update u_user_extend ue,u_user u set ue.weixin = #{weiXinOpenId} where ue.id = u.id and u.mobile = #{mobile}
update u_user_extend set weixin = #{weiXinOpenId} where id = #{userId}
update u_user_extend ue1,(SELECT weixin FROM u_user_extend WHERE id = #{id}) ue2 set ue1.weixin = ue2.weixin WHERE ue1.id = #{userId};
update u_user_extend set weixin = null WHERE id = #{userId};
update u_user_extend set weixin = null WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM u_user WHERE mobile=#{mobile});
update u_user_extend set baidu_channel_id = #{baiDuChannelId},device_type = #{deviceType} WHERE id = #{userId};
update u_user_extend set baidu_channel_id = null WHERE id = #{userId};
